#summary Description of ZigBee
#labels zigbee,meshnetworking,802.15.4

= Introduction =

ZigBee is a wireless (mesh) networking protocol built on the IEEE 802.15.4 standard.
For more information, visit <a href="www.zigbee.org">www.zigbee.org</a> and <a href="en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ZigBee">en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ZigBee</a>.
